casebody.data:
Sharon D. HOPMANN, Appellant,
v.
REALTY EXCHANGE, INC., Defendant,
and
Kaplan Associates, LLC, Respondent. No. ED 106809 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION ONE. Filed: November 20, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied December 27, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied March 5, 2019 FOR APPELLANT: Jeremy A. Gogel, 4542 West Pine Boulevard, St. Louis, MO 63108. FOR RESPONDENT: Brent W. Baldwin, M. Brendhan Flynn, 12747 Olive Boulevard, Suite 280, St. Louis, MO 63141. Before Robert M. Clayton III, P.J., Angela T. Quigless, J., and Richard K. Zerr, Sp. J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

Sharon D. Hopmann ("Plaintiff") appeals the grant of summary judgment in favor of Kaplan Associates, LLC on Plaintiff's claims for legal malpractice and breach of fiduciary duty. We find no error has occurred.

No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. We have, however, provided the parties a memorandum setting forth the reasons for our decision. The judgment of the trial court is affirmed under Rule 84.16(b).
